StatDef.label: Max Lasso Distance
StatDef.description: The maximum distance from which an enemy can be lassoed by this pawn.\nAffected by the equipped lasso type.

StatDef.label: Melee Lethality
StatDef.description: This pawn's lethality when performing executions. This value represents the chance to kill when performing execution animations, including when winning a duel.

StatDef.label: Melee Duel Ability
StatDef.description: This pawn's effectiveness in melee duels. This stat value is compared against the opponents, and influcenes the outcome of the duel.

StatDef.label: Lasso Cooldown
StatDef.description: The cooldown, measured in seconds, between lasso uses. Affected by lasso type and pawn health status.

StatDef.label: Execution Cooldown
StatDef.description: The cooldown, measured in seconds, between melee executions. Affected by pawn melee skill and other factors.

StatDef.label: Lasso Reel Speed
StatDef.description: The speed of ensnaring and then reeling in an enemy using a lasso.\nHigher values mean that it takes less time to grab and pull the target into melee range.\nThis is NOT the lasso cooldown.
